name: Mermaid
overview:
Mermaid was produced by Rock-Ola Mfg. Corp. in 1982.

Navigate your sailboat across the ocean while avoiding a wide variety of obstacles.

Nosing your tiny one-master out of the harbor, you are instantly in a race for the next berth. Along the way, you must change headings and tack, hook up with fast breezes and currents that will help your race time. Avoid land masses, choppy seas and overly-friendly dolphins that can capsize your sailboat and turn it into shark bait.
